org.atteo.moonshine.tests

Class MoonshineRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.atteo.moonshine.tests.MoonshineRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.rules.TestRule

    public class MoonshineRule
extends Object
implements org.junit.rules.TestRule
    JUnit rule which initializes Moonshine container.

    It is better for your test class to extend MoonshineTest or have it annotated with @RunWith(MoonshineRunner.class). With those solutions the test class is created using Guice injector.

    Usage: 

     class Test {
     @ClassRule
     public static final MoonshineRule moonshine = new MoonshineRule();
     @Rule
     public MethodRule injections = moonshine.injectMembers(this);
 }

        public MoonshineRule(String... configs)
        Initializes Moonshine environment.

        Usage: 

         class Test {
     @ClassRule
     public static final MoonshineRule moonshine = new MoonshineRule();
 }

        Parameters:
        configs - resource path to the configuration files, by default "/test-config.xml"

      • injectMembers

        public org.junit.rules.MethodRule injectMembers(Object object)
        Returns the rule which injects members of given object on each test run.

        Usage: 

         class Test {
     @ClassRule
     public static final MoonshineRule moonshine = new MoonshineRule();
     @Rule
     public MethodRule injections = moonshine.injectMembers(this);
 }

        Parameters:
        object - object to inject members into
        Returns:
        the method rule to use with JUnit
